title: Default value in report parameter list box is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.
5. Close and reopen the report parameter settings.
6. Verify that the previously set default value is no longer present in the list box.
OB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.
5. Close and reopen the report parameter settings.
6. Verify that the previously set default value is no longer present in the list box.
